name: Enter the Gungeon Clone
description:
Game Development Final Project with Iris Oh, Wesley Davies, and Eric Ni.

Simple Clone of the popular shooter, featuring set designs, enemy AI, and items and guns inspired by or directly cloned from ENTER THE GUNGEON by DodgeRoll. 

How to Play: 

SHOOT TO START MOVING

WASD - To move 

LEFT-CLICK - Shoot Enemies

RIGHT-CLICK - Dodge Roll

R - Reload- with reload timer

Q - Blank- removes enemy bullets and knocks them back

E - Open Chests / Interact with item

Press 2 and 3 to respectively switch to the second and third guns you have picked up

Game Description: 

Enter the Gungeon (Clone) is a 2D shooter game where you can explore varieties of dungeons, guns, and shoot enemies. You, as a player, are required to explore the map and kill all enemies to clear the Dungeon. If you decide to let the cute enemies live, they will follow you till your death! Find secret chests hidden around the map and upgrade or boost your weapons. Walk behind tables for cover to survive the unforgiving, rapid-fire of the enemies. Reload, take a breath, and  shoot 'em all! Make the Dungeon your Gungeon.
